languages.text: "Утверждение ложно. Истинная плоть дарована Омниссией и есть возвышение тела к идеальному образцу, а не деградация его".
"This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."
languages.original_text: "Утверждение ложно. Истинная плоть дарована Омниссией и есть возвышение тела к идеальному образцу, а не деградация его".

traits.locale_text: "The statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than to degrade the body, elevates it towards its perfect image."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than to degrade the body, elevates it towards its perfect image."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

traits.locale_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “这种说法是错误的。实肉是来自欧姆尼塞亚的礼物，它不仅不会令身体堕落，反而会令它朝着完美的形象进化。”
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

traits.locale_text: “这种说法是错误的。实肉是来自欧姆尼塞亚的礼物，它不仅不会令身体堕落，反而会令它朝着完美的形象进化。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Esta declaración es falsa. La verdadera carne es un don del Omnissiah que, lejos de degradar el cuerpo, lo eleva hacia su perfección».
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

traits.locale_text: «Esta declaración es falsa. La verdadera carne es un don del Omnissiah que, lejos de degradar el cuerpo, lo eleva hacia su perfección».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「この言葉は誤りだ。真なる肉体は、肉体を劣化させるのではなく、むしろその完全なイメージに向かって肉体を高める、万機神からの贈り物である」
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

traits.locale_text: 「この言葉は誤りだ。真なる肉体は、肉体を劣化させるのではなく、むしろその完全なイメージに向かって肉体を高める、万機神からの贈り物である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Das Wahre Fleisch ist ein Geschenk des Omnissiah, das den Körper nicht degradiert, sondern ihn erhebt und seinem perfekten Ebenbild näherbringt."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Aussage ist inkorrekt. Das Wahre Fleisch ist ein Geschenk des Omnissiah, das den Körper nicht degradiert, sondern ihn erhebt und seinem perfekten Ebenbild näherbringt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. La chair véritable est un don de l'Omnimessie qui ne déshonore pas le corps, mais l'élève pour mieux correspondre à son image parfaite. »
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

traits.locale_text: « Cette déclaration est erronée. La chair véritable est un don de l'Omnimessie qui ne déshonore pas le corps, mais l'élève pour mieux correspondre à son image parfaite. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

languages.text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Salt Suret; Hermesih'in bir armağanı olup bedeni alçaltmak değil, onu kusursuzluğa doğru yükseltmektir."
languages.original_text: "This statement is false. The True Flesh is a gift from the Omnissiah which, rather than degrading the body, elevates it toward its perfect image."

traits.locale_text: "Bu önerme yanlış. Salt Suret, Hermesih'in bir armağanıdır ve bedeni küçültmek değil, onu kusursuzluğa doğru yükseltmektir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
